By polish_petrie135@hotmail.com on Sunday, May 24, 2009 - 01:30 am:

What monster was your first Hall of Famer? What
was its forte move? What year was it?

By Elf* on Monday, May 25, 2009 - 12:10 pm:

A ghost called Kaspyr, Magic Cards, 1063 ( I only
learnt how to play in 1055, my ghost's 'birth').

By lileave on Tuesday, June 9, 2009 - 09:38 pm:

Inceptor, a Tiger/Zuum. It was about 1050, and its forte move was Stab, followed closely by Combination.

By Azulazulazula on Wednesday, February 29, 2012 - 01:33 pm:

Polar Bear, pure Tiger. Blizzard as its forte, and the year totally escapes me...but its stats went something like:

Lif - 100
Pow - 80
Int - 999
Ski - 999
Spd - 999
Def - ~50
